channel.title: Examples :: S2DM
channel.description: Below are some examples of how the Simplified Semantic Data Modeling (S2DM) approach can be applied in different areas or use cases. Each example is linked to its corresponding folder in the repository for further exploration. Example Use Cases Multiple Classification Schemes: Enabling multiple classification schemes using SKOS. Multiple Domains: Covering cross-references across different domains. Seat Capabilities: Specifying possible operations linked to seat-related objects or entities. Seat to VSS Mapping: Mapping modular seat specifications to the Vehicle Signal Specification (VSS).
